constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LIEU:
H.R. 3054.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to Section 1, Article 8.
[Page H2153]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: 21st Century Federal Writers’ Project Act
